law.catch_line: Application and review of proposed research projects.

text.section: A proposed research project shall be submitted to the board on an application developed by the Cabinet for Health and Family Services in consultation with the board. The submission deadline for the application shall be determined by the board.

The board shall review the project proposal for scientific merit and adherence to the research priority established in this section. After reviewing the project proposal's scientific merit and adherence to the research priority, the board shall determine whether a project proposal shall or shall not be funded. An applicant shall be notified of the board's decision by a date determined by the board.

law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 72, sec. 1, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 370, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 171, sec. 4, effective July 13, 2004.
